content: For release on delivery  1:00 p.m. EDT (7:00 p.m. local time)  July 16, 2019      Monetary Policy in the Post-Crisis Era         Remarks by     Jerome H. Powell     Chair     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     “Bretton Woods:  75 Years Later—Thinking about the Next 75,”  a conference organized by    the Banque de France and the French Ministry for the Economy and Finance      Paris, France                 July 16, 2019
